reviews.review_text: I like the fact that it's got to be that burst when you were washing your face. I do, however wish that it made more foam so as to at least look like it's cleaning my face more than it is. I feel that it is not clean as well as it should especially for the price.

reviews.title: Clean
reviews.review_text: Ive used this duo so long that if I go to the store and they are(rare situation) out, I immediately order online once I return home if I only have a couple weeks of use left. I am now 61 years old and have no idea what else I'd trust to wash my face. My face feels smooth and not dry after I use it. Ive been using the day wash so long that it was with me through my teenage ache years and young broken heart when crying in the shower! So, to change from my favorite facial cleaner now, nah it is not in my plans!

reviews.title: Acne Battling Soap
reviews.review_text: I like that the beads help wash away dirt and oil from your skin BUT if you have naturally dry skin this will dry your skin out MORE. I recommend using a moisturizer after.

reviews.title: Why Your Seeing Certain Results
reviews.review_text: SO i have been seeing reviews that say they get a burning sensation from using the clean and clear morning burst face cleanser but that they are also using a brush with it. The reason that you are getting this burning sensation when you use the product is because you are ALSO using the brush. Cleaning you skin with a brush is also a method of exfoliation, which is NOT a bad thing EXCEPT for when you do that everyday. YOU DO NOT WANT TO BE EXFOLIATING EVERYDAY. I strongly recommend to only exfoliate once or twice a week because otherwise in the long run you will be taking a toll on your skin and you will be constantly removing skin cells everyday which will cause you skin to look more aged. The beads in this cleanser are already a gentle exfoliant.

reviews.title: Switched to this from different brand
reviews.review_text: I used a brand called Boscia for a few years but it never cleared my acne on my combo skin. I tried sample sizes of the morning burst and night relaxing now my skin is clear so I plan on buying full sizes. Strongly recommend a good moisturizer with these products.

reviews.title: Good and bad
reviews.review_text: When i started going back to school i got this product to feel refreshed and brighten my skin in the morning which it did. It feels soft on your skin and does what it says it does but i noticed i started to get red spots and blotchy skin. Sometimes it made my face itch and had a rash type of look on my cheeks and chin but that might just be my skin. It is good for its purpose but there are side affects.
